wikipedia_page.main: Kirk Dawes QPM (born c. 1957) is a former Detective Constable with West Midlands Police who formerly ran The Centre For Conflict Transformation (TCFCT) formerly West Midlands Mediation and Transformation Services, a company involved in trying to reduce gun and gang violence in the United Kingdom.

response: * Kirk Dawes QPM (born ca.1957) – Detective Constable with West Midlands Police, founded the Centre For Conflict Transformation, a company trying to reduce gun and gang violence
